# This file was generated by Jucer2CMake from MultiOutSynth.jucer

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED MultiOutSynth_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "MultiOutSynth_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(MultiOutSynth_jucer_FILE
  "${MultiOutSynth_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

if(NOT EXISTS "${MultiOutSynth_jucer_FILE}")
  message(FATAL_ERROR "No such file: ${MultiOutSynth_jucer_FILE}")
endif()

get_filename_component(MultiOutSynth_jucer_DIR
  "${MultiOutSynth_jucer_FILE}" DIRECTORY
)


jucer_project_begin(
  PROJECT_NAME "MultiOutSynth"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  COMPANY_NAME "ROLI Ltd."
  COMPANY_WEBSITE "www.roli.com"
  COMPANY_EMAIL "info@juce.com"
  PROJECT_TYPE "Audio Plug-in"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.ROLI.MultiOutSynth"
  BINARYDATACPP_SIZE_LIMIT "Default"
  # BINARYDATA_NAMESPACE
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  PROJECT_ID "CbHSoe"
)

jucer_audio_plugin_settings(
  BUILD_VST ON
  BUILD_AUDIOUNIT ON
  PLUGIN_NAME "MultiOutSynth"
  PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION "MultiOutSynth"
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER "ROLI Ltd."
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER_CODE "ROLI"
  PLUGIN_CODE "MoSy"
  # PLUGIN_CHANNEL_CONFIGURATIONS
  PLUGIN_IS_A_SYNTH ON
  PLUGIN_MIDI_INPUT ON
  PLUGIN_MIDI_OUTPUT OFF
  MIDI_EFFECT_PLUGIN OFF
  KEY_FOCUS OFF
  PLUGIN_AU_EXPORT_PREFIX "MultiOutSynthAU"
  # PLUGIN_AU_MAIN_TYPE
  # VST_CATEGORY
)

  "${MultiOutSynth_jucer_DIR}/Source/BinaryData/singing.ogg"
)

)

if(APPLE)
  set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES Debug Release)

  add_compile_options(
    $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-O0>
    $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O3>
  )
endif()

if(MSVC_VERSION EQUAL 1900) # VS2015
  set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES Debug Release)

  add_compile_options(
    $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:/Od>
    $<$<CONFIG:Release>:/O2>
  )
endif()
